sen.e: After the death of influential Ieyasu TOKUGAWA, Sadakatsu was well-respected by Ieyasu's nephew, Shogun Hidetada TOKUGAWA, but he refused firmly an offer to be a chamberlain from Hidetada in July, 1623.
